resources.name: openai-o3-o4-mini-system-card
resources.title: OpenAI o3 and o4-mini System Card
resources.description: Official system card PDF detailing OpenAI's o3 and o4-mini reasoning models: architecture, tool use, safety evaluations, benchmarks, and preparedness assessment.

resources.name: openai-o3-mini-system-card
resources.title: OpenAI o3-mini System Card (Feb 10, 2025)
resources.description: Official system card PDF for OpenAI's o3-mini model (published Feb 10, 2025), covering safety evaluations, risk assessments under the Preparedness Framework, red-teaming outcomes, and model-autonomy risk ratings.

resources.name: openai-deep-research-system-card
resources.title: OpenAI Deep Research System Card (Feb 25, 2025)
resources.description: Official system card PDF detailing OpenAI's Deep Research agent: architecture, safety and preparedness evaluations, browsing and tool-use capabilities, limitations, and red-teaming results.

resources.name: openai-gpt-4o-system-card
resources.title: OpenAI GPT-4o System Card
resources.description: Official system card PDF for OpenAI's GPT-4o (“omni”) model, detailing multimodal capabilities (text, image, speech), safety evaluations, Preparedness Framework assessments, red-teaming results, and risk mitigation strategies.

resources.name: openai-gpt-5-system-card
resources.title: OpenAI GPT-5 System Card (Aug 2025)
resources.description: Official system card PDF for GPT-5, covering architecture, routing of main vs thinking models, safety & alignment evaluations, benchmark performance, and updates compared to previous GPT releases.

resources.name: openai-gpt-5-codex-system-card
resources.title: Addendum to GPT-5 System Card: GPT-5-Codex
resources.description: Official addendum PDF for GPT-5-Codex (September 15, 2025), detailing model-specific safety mitigations, evaluation benchmarks, risk assessments, and comparisons to GPT-5/other models. :contentReference[oaicite:0]{index=0}
